name: Do They Live
description:
Do They Live?

This is very early access, not an interactive game yet. There will be updates.

70 dots will fight for survival using their genetics to ensure their lineage. Watch them evolve into more complex beings.

Press enter to change the speed of their world. Watch them at 30 fps, or leave them overnight at 300 fps.

Average genetics are shown on the left.

Number of dots, and average generation number shown at the top.

Dots now grow new parts.
